subtitle: This fragrant meal is beautifully presented is parchment parcels.

method.text: Cut out 13 cm x 13cm squares out of greaseproof paper - two squares per serving. Lay two squres on top of each other for double thickness. Lay one chicken breast in the middle of each.
In a bowl, mix together all the other ingredients. Pour the sauce equally over the chicken breasts.
Twist the ends of the square together to seal. Fold othe other edges over to enclose the chicken mixture.
Place on a baking tray in the oven for 30-40 min or until cooked.
Carefully open the paper envelopes and serve.

title: Coconut chicken en papillote
